channel.title: Linux help
channel.description: Although, this probably isn't programming, this is the best place I found for such a topic. Basically, I bought a VPS, got all the info for it etc. Now, I connected using SSH with a putty. BUT, I have NO idea how to use linux, therefore I am asking the forum for help. How do I enable the graphical connection to it?

item.title: Linux help
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Read up on Xserver

Read full topic
